description: A template to monitor a single zCX appliance and the containers running in it.

panels.description: Time since the zCX appliance was started
panels.title: Appliance Uptime

panels.description: The CPU utilization per virtual CPU % of the zCX appliance calculated over the last 2 minutes.
panels.title: Appliance CPU Utilization

panels.description: zCX appliance used memory %
panels.title: Appliance Physical Used Memory

panels.description: zCX appliance buffered/cached memory as a % of the total memory
panels.title: Appliance Buffered/Cached Memory

panels.description: The % of disk space currently in use in the zCX appliance
panels.title: Appliance Used Disk Space

panels.description: The % of swap space currently in use in the zCX appliance
panels.title: Appliance Used Swap Space

panels.description: The total number of running containers in the zCX appliance
panels.title: Containers

panels.description: The number of CPUs configured for the zCX appliance
panels.title: Appliance CPU count

panels.description: The total memory configured for the zCX appliance
panels.title: Appliance Total Memory

panels.description: The total disk space configured for the zCX appliance
panels.title: Appliance Total Disk Space

panels.description: The total swap space configured for the zCX appliance
panels.title: Appliance Total Swap Space

panels.description: CPU utilization of the zCX appliance over time
panels.title: Appliance CPU Utilization over time

panels.description: The zCX appliance total used memory over time
panels.title: Appliance Used Memory

panels.description: The zCX appliance total used disk space over time
panels.title: Appliance Used Disk Space

rows.title: Appliance CPU and Memory Utilization over time

panels.description: Total number of bytes per second (received and sent) averaged over the last 2 minutes vs time
panels.title: Appliance Network traffic

panels.description: Disk I/O read rates over time on the zCX appliance
panels.title: Appliance Disk I/O Read

panels.description: Disk I/O write rates over time on the zCX appliance
panels.title: Appliance Disk I/O Write

panels.description: zCX appliance load averages averaged over 1, 5, and 15 minutes.
panels.title: Appliance Load Averages

panels.description: CPU utilization of individual containers as a percentage of the CPU count of the zCX appliance averaged over the last 2 minutes vs time
panels.title: Container CPU Utilization %

panels.description: Amount of memory currently in use per container running on the zCX appliance vs time
panels.title: Container Physical Memory Usage

panels.description: Bytes received over the network by each container per second in the last two minutes vs time
panels.title: Received Network Traffic for each Container

panels.description: Bytes transmitted over the network by each container per second in the last two minutes vs time
panels.title: Sent Network Traffic for each Container

panels.description: Bytes read by each container per second calculated over the last two minutes of data vs time
panels.title: Bytes read per second for each Container

panels.description: Bytes written per second for each container calculated over the last two minutes of data vs time
panels.title: Bytes written per second for each Container

panels.description: Used physical memory for each container.  This is the amount of memory resident in physical memory.
panels.title: Used Physical Memory

panels.description: Total used memory including cached items  for each container.
panels.title: Total Used Memory

panels.description: Memory limit set for each container. The value of 0 means no limit set.
panels.title: Memory Limit

panels.description: Remaining memory % as determined by the physical used memory and the memory limit, if set.  This is the percentage of unused memory below the memory limit.
panels.title: Remaining memory %

title: IBM zCX for z/OS Monitoring
